name: Knife (addgar22)
description:
In Knife, you play as a detective where you go around and try to find clues that will lead you to the killer. Can you find them and solve the murderer?

Credits: 

The code was made by the team that created Knife: Addison Garlove, and Chase Savage. It started off as an idea that didn't seem obtainable for a Game Design class but with the hard work from Chase, who found all the music and other resources we may need, the game seemed doable. Addison Garlove came up with the idea first and was the scribe that put all of the code into the game. 

Special thanks to:

Micheal Kiang-Helping us whenever we got stuck 

Aspen Caudill-Grammar and Storyboard
